reviews.text: Great place.  Went for our anniversary and they treated us fantastic. Will definitely be back.
This was a wedding celebration.  The salads were fresh and delicious.  The entrees were excellent and plentiful.  The wait staff was efficient and friendly.

I know, I know, you're thinking, "Another Italian joint-- big deal." But would you look at that steak? Just look at it! It was cooked to perfection and the accompanying horse radish sauce was to DIE for. I recommend giving it a go. Oh, did I mention they have bread? Yes, and addictive butter too!
We had a  private dinner very nice food.
Wish they would finish rebuilding this historic place.
They are closed. The gym I got too is right next door.
Such a nice building it's a waste it's abandoned
The administrator lady is very rude. She goes to kitchen without uniform. We tried to ask her why but the answer was: It is not your bussiness.The vodka quality is very bad (we had Beluga on friday).
Been there many times during my 4-month stay in Almaty.  Nice place but bit expensive in terms of Almaty.

Great look and atmosphere
Discovered to late but definitely coming back
